powers: Melter has the ability to liquefy organic and inorganic matter, although he doesn't seem to be in complete control of his power
significantissues: First time in action and confronted by Young Avengers (Dark Reign: Young Avengers #1, 2009)
potentially offered a place on Young Avengers (Dark Reign: Young Avengers #2, 2009) partnered with Patriot as part of recruiting session (Dark Reign: Young Avengers #3, 2009)
declined membership into Young Avengers and called Norman Osborn (Dark Reign: Young Avengers #4, 2009)
undecided on his path in life and retreated with teammates (Dark Reign: Young Avengers #5, 2009)
